name: zenvars

releases.name: Zenvars v0.2.0
releases.body: This release adds support for setting enum values!

releases.name: Zenvars v0.1.0
releases.body:
Notable changes:

- Empty values supported now: `KEY=`.  The default value of the struct will be used instead
- Keys are now case insensitive, so you could have `NAME=John` in your env-file, and the field `name` in your struct would be set to John
